headline: Nothing to learn
pros: Flexible hours and days, whenever you're free
cons:
It's unpaid, and they treat you as such; they can find another intern to do it. Very manual and unrelated work (was once assigned opening any mails and sorting them)
Also because they have so many interns (because they all pretty much get hired and taken advantage of), there's not enough computers to work on.
You're better off just saving money by not paying for a metrocard and stay at home; there's literally nothing to learn

headline: Unpaid internship
pros: Flexible work schedule, not micro managed.
cons: Didn't learn much about the finance field

headline: Unstructured - its what you make of it.
pros:
Very knowledgeable and well networked group. 
they do weekly classes that are very insightful on the hedge fund industry.

headline: Manager
pros: Good opportunity to learn and mix in the Wall St. financial services business areas.
cons: Pays, less opportunity than I expected to get.

headline: Intern
pros: Very smart people, laid back environment with fair hours, informal so it gives you the opportunity to be creative and offer any advice to the team while working very hands on in projects, Victor (CEO) is always more than willing to talk during lunch or downtime about any subjects and topics you may have questions on.  He also has great connections throughout the whole finance community.

headline: Intern
pros: No supervision at all. You can come any time and go any time
cons: Hectic work place. I have not learned anything besides wasting my time

headline: Intern
cons: Easy tasks, not too much to learn

headline: hedge fund capital raiser
pros: Opportunity to attend alternative asset event each month to meet some expertise in hedge fund field.
cons: unpaid internship, small place, not too much to learn

headline: Intern
cons: Limited learning, interns are not exposed to the business

headline: intern
pros: free working environment. bosses are nice and location is not bad
cons:
nothing to learn related to finance area.
No technical requirement and nothing else to say.
